Articles.Content:
Thanks to Squad for creating a well built video game that you haven't stopped improving. I personally thank you for the positive impact you've had on my life and many others. 

Once again, Thank You Squad,

PilotsOfRiots

It's been a while since I last posted on this thread, so I figured I'd get in before the 1.1 love/hate rush...

KSP for me has been by far the best value entertainment purchase I have made.  It has allowed me, to some extent, to live my childhood dreams of going in to space.  It has given me a 'bolt hole' in stressful times, and given me great challenges when I want to face them.  I can be at peace just messing about casually, or deeply engrossed planning and executing difficult missions.

I have enjoyed the journey so far and look forward to continuing it alongside you and my fellow players as the game develops and evolves.

Keep up the good work.  I am looking forward to 1.1 and in particular the possibilities it opens up for the future.

And thanks to the whole dev team and support staff, I know it's your 'job' but without the dedication and passion you show the game would not be what it is.  And thanks too to the forum moderators for your time and dedication, for keeping us all in check and ensuring that this community remains the great place it has become.

Hi everyone

Just made my forum account so that I can give a big thanks to all the @Squad staff for their work on KSP over the years!

I bought KSP 0.90 after playing the demo on Steam and was amazed by the game from the first moment, now hundreds of hours of gameplay later I enjoy the game even more! :-) There are very, very few other games that I can say that about, maybe only 2 (DCS + Civ V)

As someone who had an interest in spaceflight and scientific exploration for many years before finding KSP, I cannot stress enough how inspirational and useful KSP has been for me in re-igniting my interest in science! I have learnt so much in such a short time and now use KSP to help teach my niece about our Solar System and various other fun science related topics

A huge thank you to Squad for the continued development and support of the game, as well as making it so mod friendly and a huge thank you to the KSP community for being so helpful! This game is worth every penny many many times over, I hope it brings more success and recognition for Squad in the future. 

Modders deserves a huge thanks too so I need to pop around various threads to thank them as well :-)

Praise the Sun!

KSP has rekindled my interest in spaceflight, and stolen much of my free time.

It's only on the days when I open KSP and can't think of anything to do that I know I'm having a truly horrible day.

Thank you, Devs and modders, for giving me the best $20-$40 I ever spent.

Without a doubt, best game for showing your creativity, and probably, best game about space, with bits of edutainment, need to think what are you doing, planning, building and, of course, lots of content, addons, and fun gameplay.

Also, one of the most friendly communities of any game.

Thanks KSP team for reviving an old childhood fascination with space, and providing me with the means to educate myself on the topic in various ways that makes for a lot of eye rolling from my wife in social gatherings when I'm asked about space things. 

Thanks for enduring the people who gripe about a well needed vacation after providing us with a great new update, that while a little bit bugged, is a big stepping stone in the game's future. 

Thanks KSP team for everything you've done so far and will continue to do.
I don't think I've been so challenged by the game since Colobot. Thank you SQUAD and keep adding features, optimising and fixing bugs.
